build: docker exec -it --user www-data core composer install
docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan key:generate --ansi
docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan storage:link
docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan webpush:vapid
scripts.scribe: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan scribe:generate
scripts.fix: docker exec -it --user www-data core php-cs-fixer fix --config=.php-cs-fixer.php --verbose --ansi
scripts.lint: docker exec -it --user www-data core php-cs-fixer fix --config=.php-cs-fixer.php --verbose --ansi --dry-run
scripts.migrate: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan migrate
scripts.migrate:fresh: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan migrate:fresh
scripts.migrate:rollback: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan migrate:rollback
scripts.migrate:status: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan migrate:status
ide-helper: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan ide-helper:generate .ide-helper.php
docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan ide-helper:models --smart-reset --write --phpstorm-noinspections
docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan ide-helper:meta --filename=.phpstorm.meta.php
docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan enum:annotate
scripts.publish:static: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan vendor:publish --tag=statics --force
scripts.populate:user: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan populate:user
scripts.populate:exercise: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan populate:exercise
scripts.populate:workout: docker exec -it --user www-data core php artisan populate:workout
